title: (x) Fin & Feather - Utopia (stretched) {Mark S}
content:
I can't find this one anywhere!   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141551im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22204.jpg)
author: julia

comments.content: I spent an hour while we were watching television flipping through the Font Book starting at A, to reach the same conclusion (I knew that 't' looked familiar). If I had started at Z, I might have gotten there sooner, but when I ran upstairs and saw your post, I said a bad word and went back to the TV. (I thought Utopia Bold with some widening.) Good job, Mark.
Sorry to spoil your evening, Mike. :-) I got lucky and recognized it on sight.
